General.Name: Jiangsu Cnano Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangsu Cnano Technology Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and sells carbon nanotube materials and related products in China. The company's products include carbon nanotube powder, carbon nanotube and graphene conductive paste, carbon nanotube conductive masterbatch, and others. Its products are used in lithium batteries, super capacitors, lead acid batteries, conductive polymer composites, antistatic coatings, sporting goods, and tire rubber reinforcement. The company was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in Zhenjiang, China.

1.Name: Mr. Cai  Yonglue
1.Title: VP of Fin., Deputy GM, CFO, Sec. & Director
